00040 #ifndef _uimenuwindow_h
00041 #define _uimenuwindow_h
00042 
00043 #include "uiwindow.h"
00044 
00045 #include <vector>
00046 #include <utility>
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     namespace UI
00051     {
00052         class UIlayer;
00053         class Menu;
00054         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00055         /// @class MenuWindow
00056         /// @headerfile uimenuwindow.h
00057         /// @brief This class is an extended version of the window class for use exclusively with the menu widget.
00058         /// @details
00059         ///////////////////////////////////////
00060         class PHYS_LIB MenuWindow : public Window
00061         {
00062             protected:
00063                 MenuWindow* ParentWindow;
00064                 UI::Menu* MasterMenu;
00065                 Button* BackButton;
00066                 std::vector<std::pair<Button*,MenuWindow*> > ChildWindows;
00067             public:
00068                 /// @brief Standard initialization constructor.
00069                 /// @param Name The name of the window.
00070                 /// @param Position The position of the window.
00071                 /// @param Size The size of the window.
00072                 /// @param TheMenu The menu this window belongs to.
00073                 /// @param Layer The parent layer this window belongs to.
00074                 MenuWindow(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UI::Menu* TheMenu, UILayer* Layer);
00075                 /// @brief Standard destructor.
00076                 virtual ~MenuWindow();
00077                 /// @brief Gets the parent window of this window.
00078                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the parent window of this window, or NULL if this is the root window.
00079                 virtual MenuWindow* GetParentWindow();
00080                 /// @brief Creates a back button for this window.
00081                 /// @details The name is autogenerated to be the name of the window + "back".
00082                 /// This function will do nothing if the back button has already been created.
00083                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the created Back Button.
00084                 virtual Button* CreateBackButton(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size);
00085                 /// @brief Gets the back button of this window.
00086                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the Back Button, or NULL if it hasn't been created.
00087                 virtual Button* GetBackButton();
00088                 /// @brief Creates a button to be used for accessing child windows.
00089                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the created button.
00090                 /// @param Name The name of the button.
00091                 /// @param Position The position of the button.
00092                 /// @param Size The size of the button.
00093                 virtual Button* CreateAccessorButton(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size);
00094                 /// @brief Gets an Accessor button by name.
00095                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the named accessor button.
00096                 /// @param Name The name of the accessor button you want to find.
00097                 virtual Button* GetAccessorButton(ConstString& Name);
00098                 /// @brief Gets the Window corresponding to the access button.
00099                 /// @param Accessor Pointer to the Button of which you want to get the window for.
00100                 /// @return Returns A pointer to the Menu window the button provided accesses.
00101                 virtual MenuWindow* GetWindowOfAccessButton(Button* Accessor);
00102                 /// @brief Adds a child window to this window.
00103                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the created child window.
00104                 /// @param Name The name of the window.
00105                 /// @param Position The position of the window.
00106                 /// @param Size The size of the window.
00107                 virtual MenuWindow* CreateChildMenuWindow(ConstString& Name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, Button* Accessor);
00108                 /// @brief Gets an already created menu window by name.
00109                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the menu window of the specified name.
00110                 virtual MenuWindow* GetChildMenuWindow(ConstString& Name);
00111                 /// @brief Gets an already created menu window by index.
00112                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the menu window at the specified index.
00113                 virtual MenuWindow* GetChildMenuWindow(const Whole Index);
00114                 /// @brief Gets the number of menu windows created and stored in this class.
00115                 /// @return Returns the number of menu windows this class is storing.
00116                 virtual Whole GetNumChildMenuWindows();
00117                 /// @brief Destroys a menu window.
00118                 /// @param ToBeDestroyed Pointer to the menu window you want destroyed.
00119                 virtual void DestroyChildMenuWindow(MenuWindow* ToBeDestroyed);
00120         };
00121     }
00122 }
00123 
00124 #endif
